alert.note: Alert for Allen (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 16 at 3:32PM CST until February 17 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation changing to snow. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of one tenth to two tenths of an inch. Locally higher snow amounts are possible. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Allen County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous road conditions. Blowing and drifting snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on Thursday. The hazardous conditions will have impact on the Thursday morning and evening commutes. The combination of gusty winds and the weight of snow and ice could bring down tree branches and lead to scattered power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Where snow occurs, snowfall rates of one to two inches per hour will be possible Thursday. The timing of the heaviest precipitation rates is expected from 6 am to 2 pm Thursday.
info.instruction: The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
